casebody.data:
October Twenty-Four, Inc. v. Tomasso Brothers, Inc., et al. (13139)

Dupont, C. J., and O’Connell and Foti, Js.

Argued January 3 decision released January 31, 1995 *953Peter J. Zagorsky, for the appellant (plaintiff). Kenneth R. Slater, Jr., with whom was Stephen J. Anderson, for the appellee (named defendant). Thomas P. Byrne, with whom, on the brief, was Steven E. Byrne, for the appellee (defendant town of Plainville et al.). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
